content: दोहदः --दं [दोहमाकर्षं ददाति दा-क] {@--1@} ({%a%}) The longing of a pregnant woman; प्रजावती दोहदशंसिनी ते <ls>R. 14. 45</ls>; उपेत्य सा दोहददुःखशीलतां यदेव वव्रे तदाश्यदाहृतं <ls n="R.">3. 6</ls>, <ls n="R. 3.">7.</ls> ({%b%}) The desired object itself. {@--2@} Pregnancy. {@--3@} The desire of plants at budding time (as, for instance, of the Aśoka to be kicked by young ladies, of the Bakula to with sprinkled by mouthfuls of liquor &c.); महीरुहा दोहदसेकशक्तेराकालिकं कोरकमुद्गिरंति <ls>N. 3. 21</ls>; <ls>R. 8. 62</ls>; <ls>Me. 78</ls>; see अशोक. {@--4@} Vehement desire; प्रवर्तितमहासमरदोहदा नरपतयः <ls>Ve. 4.</ls> {@--5@} Wish or desire in general.

दोहदः --दं [दोहमाकर्षं ददाति दा-क] {@--1@} ({%a%}) The longing of a pregnant woman; प्रजावती दोहदशंसिनी ते <ls>R. 14. 45</ls>; उपेत्य सा दोहददुःखशीलतां यदेव वव्रे तदाश्यदाहृतं <ls n="R.">3. 6</ls>, <ls n="R. 3.">7.</ls> ({%b%}) The desired object itself. {@--2@} Pregnancy. {@--3@} The desire of plants at budding time (as, for instance, of the Aśoka to be kicked by young ladies, of the Bakula to with sprinkled by mouthfuls of liquor &c.); महीरुहा दोहदसेकशक्तेराकालिकं कोरकमुद्गिरंति <ls>N. 3. 21</ls>; <ls>R. 8. 62</ls>; <ls>Me. 78</ls>; see अशोक. {@--4@} Vehement desire; प्रवर्तितमहासमरदोहदा नरपतयः <ls>Ve. 4.</ls> {@--5@} Wish or desire in general.
